definition: the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh

sentences.english: In other words, be tactful, but don’t be afraid to give your honest opinion.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，要机智，但是别怕发表你真实的意见。

sentences.english: All participants were given a series of questions about the true self.
sentences.chinese: 所有参与者都要回答有关真实的自我的一系列问题。

sentences.english: It was designed as "a real-world, highly sophisticated trading atmosphere."
sentences.chinese: 那是“真实复杂的交易氛围。”

sentences.english: This one masquerades as real, moderate thought.
sentences.chinese: 这一个伪装为真实的，温和的思想。

sentences.english: Experiment results show that those approaches have good real -time performance and vivid effect.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，该算法达到了较好的实时性和真实感。

sentences.english: Real-life details fill these books of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 真实的生活细节在这些死亡之书中随处可见。

sentences.english: In the reality, it's gonna never happen.
sentences.chinese: 而今害怕那真实得无法挣脱的梦境。

sentences.english: And why is there so little actual reporting on the process of science?
sentences.chinese: 为什么目前关于科学发展真实的报道少之又少呢？

sentences.english: Whoever invokes a blessing in the land will do so by the God of truth;
sentences.chinese: 这样，在地上为自己求福的，必凭真实的神求福。

sentences.english: This image is stark in its brutality but was the reality of the time.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片虽然很残忍，但是当时的真实写照。

sentences.english: But not all advertisements are trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，并非所有的广告都真实可靠。

sentences.english: Never try to be anything you aren’t.
sentences.chinese: 切勿试图成为一个不真实的你。

sentences.english: The corresponding unwrapped phases are achieved by use of a lookup table method.
sentences.chinese: 并且应用查表法解包得到真实调制相位分布。

sentences.english: But do these figures reflect the real income situation of Chinese people?
sentences.chinese: 但这些数据是否反映了中国人民的真实情况呢？

sentences.english: TCCC must have the right to verify the copy with the inspecting company.
sentences.chinese: TCCC公司有权与审核机构进行核实报告的真实性。

sentences.english: Signification, on the other hand, comes into play in the Vorstellung.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，真实意义是在观念的领域运作。

definition: to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
genuine/legal/see also 盜版|盗版[dao4 ban3]
the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
direct observation/directly perceived through the senses/intuitive/audiovisual
